sqlMap.select: select b.mem_id as receiver, c.mem_id as sender, a.msg_content as content, to_char(a.msg_senddate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as sentdate from message a, member b, member c where ((msg_sender = #user# and msg_target_id = #audience#) or (msg_target_id = #user# and msg_sender = #audience#)) and a.msg_target_id = b.mem_no and a.msg_sender = c.mem_no order by msg_no

mem_no = mem_no select audience as mem_id, (select mem_no from member where mem_id=audience) as mem_no from (select case when (select mem_id from member where mem_no=#mem_no#) = b.mem_id then c.mem_id else b.mem_id end as audience, a.msg_content, a.msg_senddate from message a, member b, member c where (msg_sender = #mem_no# or msg_target_id = #mem_no#) and a.msg_target_id = b.mem_no and a.msg_sender = c.mem_no order by msg_no desc) group by audience
